column4: I was having some issues getting pptp working with the network manager, but I worked out what I was doing wrong. But now I have all the test pptp connections I had setup and I can't delete them from my Network Manager Menu using nm-vpn-properties. Is any one able to tell me which configuration file NM uses to store this lis?
I guess nobody knows then... Anyone able to point me in the right direction of were too look?
